item.title: How "How to become a hacker" changed my life
item.description: I remember vividly why I wanted to write code. I wanted to be a hacker…

item.title: Hunting Production Bugs
item.description: Usually, on boarding in a new job passes in a slow rhythm during the first couple of months. That was the case with me at least, getting to know how our infrastructure at Runtastic is built..

item.title: Medium For Arabs
item.description: Our story is one of those stories, that embody mixtures of fun, thrill and good advice. And as most of the stories, itâ€™s exposing us to the human being itself; his desires, that in turns plays a main role in his life philosophy. Our story begins with a poor kid, not that kind of poverty that involves a very deep miserable state in life that needs a huge amount of fights against the Capitalism force of the world.
